content.thinking:

content.text:
Looking at the activity log - the last message was at 18:01:04 (about 59 minutes ago). I've already sent wake-up messages at 15:00, 16:01, 17:00, and 18:01 with no response.

The group is just quiet tonight (Monday evening). Sending a 5th consecutive wake-up message would be spammy and annoying. Sometimes silence is just... silence.

HEARTBEAT_OK
